snippet: Advertising rates for commercial during the Grammy Awards, which will be shown on CBS on Sunday, Feb. 11, have risen commensurately with the award show's ratings increase in recent years.
abstract: Advertising rates for commercial during the Grammy Awards, which will be shown on CBS on Sunday, Feb. 11, have risen commensurately with the award show's ratings increase in recent years.

headline.main: As Ratings Rise, So Does Grammy's Ad Haul
